content.rendered: Intamarque is a wholesale distributor for health, beauty and lifestyle brands. We have a track record in launching and growing brands in the UK. Over 15 years, we’ve built relationships with buyers in the major multiples, supermarkets, online fashion and beauty retailers. Our Sales and Buying teams have close connections, so are the go-to wholesale distributor when a key opportunities arise in the marketplace.
